data.title: Orange County home sales during week ending Sept. 23
data.meta_description: There were 236 reported residential sales in Orange County in the week ending Sept. 23, according to BlockShopper.com.
data.text:
There were 236 reported residential sales in Orange County in the week ending Sept. 23, according to BlockShopper.com. The median sales price was $1,311,500 and the median property tax bill was $5,637 for the previous year.
